messages.message: @Aaron Vontell I think running locally should just use the cloud api, I don't think you need to run the container
the ocr-msft container is very very large, so we didn't want everyone to have to download it locally
How do you use the cloud api?
It should be configured to use the cloud api by default if you don't add those flags @Anil  posted above

We have this in our local config
```    "msft_ocr_api_key": "77fed493a9914236b462b142d5b70e0e",
    "msft_ocr_endpoint": "https://ocrservices.cognitiveservices.azure.com",
    "msft_ocr_endpoint_v3": "https://ocrservices.cognitiveservices.azure.com",```
